channel.title: iPad 3 Case & Stylus?!
channel.description:
Ive been researching this for hours and cant seem to come to a conclusion. I am trying to find a decent leather case for my new iPad and a stylus for note-taking.
I wanted to buy the Jot Pro, but I am afraid it won't work with my screen protector: http://adonit.net/product/jot-pro/ It looks like im going with the Wacom Bamboo Sylus but I wanted a second opinion: http://wacom.com/en/Products/Bamboo/BambooStylus.aspx
I also wanted a decent leather case for my iPad but I cant find anything that is currently in-stock or not pre order any ideas? http://www.shophex.com/product/HX1080 or http://www.acmemade.com/product/The-Orikata-Leather-Fits-iPad-2-or-later-models,63,20.htm or http://www.incipio.com/new-iPad-Cases/Incipio-new-iPad-Lexington-Hard-Shell-Folio-Case.asp
REALLY LIKE THIS ONE: http://www.spigen.com/tablets/apple/the-new-ipad/spigen-sgp-the-new-ipad-4g-lte-wifi-leather-case-folio-s-series.html
Anybody have experience with cases or styluses?
